title: Taking a chance on love
creator_credit: Susan Dirgham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Many years ago, Susan Dirgham’s parents took a chance on love, in spite of their differences. Her parent’s leap of faith has inspired Susan Dirgham to throw herself into new experiences and follow her heart, which has taken her to some very unusual places. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio or outreach program.
